Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the chromogranin/secretogranin protein family
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Has antibacterial activity against the Gram-positive bacterium M. luteus.
